resources.string: This is Urban Game. Urban game is type of game based on your movement and location. This game allows you to play and create urban games. Every game or track consists of several riddles in particular order. Each riddle contains a hint about the place to find. The track may be based on most beautiful places of your city, best restaurants or places with historical values.

Play game - in this mode you can choose one of tracks and try to play it. At the beginning you get first riddle which should direct you to the first location. When you get to the right location with your device you get another riddle to solve. Once you solve the last one, you win.

Create a track - in this mode you create your own track by adding markers on map with hint leading to this particular place. After adding all places you want, you fill short track summary form (title, description, location) to help users find your track.
You have found the right location

Current riddle is displayed at the top. You have to find the place described by the riddle. You can leave app by pressing the home button and it will still work in background, sending you the notification if you are in the right place.
Do you want to continue last game?

Click once to add new marker. Then pass riddle text and save the marker by clicking "OK" or remove it. You can edit existing markers by clicking on them and move them by long clicking and dragging them.
Click twice to zoom in a bit. Use two fingers to rotate or zoom map. After rotating map compass icon appears in the top left corner. It shows you the North and allows you to undo all rotations.

Use first button on right to center map to your current position. Second button allows you to change type of the map. Last one is (as you already know) this info window. When you finish creating your track click "SAVE" to move to track summary.
You have found the right place
Notify when user found right place
